question.questionText: Look at the circuit in the picture. The gap between the D-cell and the switch needs to be connected. Can you use a piece of aluminum foil to make the connection? Why or why not?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Yes, aluminum foil is a metal and all metals conduct. The aluminum foil would complete the circuit.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Yes, it has metal in it.
No because it is not wires.
No, because it cannot attract electricity or get power.
